TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit EncodingProvider extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供編碼提供者的基底類別，這個提供者提供特定平台無法使用的編碼方式。

span.span: Provides the base class for an encoding provider, which supplies encodings that are unavailable on a particular platform.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 其編碼提供者提供就無法在特定目標平台上使用的編碼方式。An encoding provider supplies encodings that are not otherwise available on a particular target platform. 在 Windows 桌面上的.NET Framework 支援大量的字元編碼方式和字碼頁。The .NET Framework on the Windows desktop supports a large number of character encodings and code pages. 您可以在 Windows 桌面上取得.NET Framework 中可用的編碼方式的完整清單，藉由呼叫方法。You can get a complete list of encodings available in the .NET Framework on the Windows desktop by calling the method. .NET core 相反地，根據預設支援下列編碼方式：.NET Core, on the other hand, by default supports only the following encodings: - ASCII （字碼頁為 20127），由屬性。ASCII (code page 20127), which is returned by the property. - ISO 8859-1 （字碼頁 28591）。ISO-8859-1 (code page 28591). - Utf-7 （字碼頁為 65000），傳回屬性。UTF-7 (code page 65000), which is returned by the property. - Utf-8 （字碼頁 65001），傳回屬性。UTF-8 (code page 65001), which is returned by the property. - Utf-16 和 UTF-16LE （字碼頁為 1200年），傳回屬性。UTF-16 and UTF-16LE (code page 1200), which is returned by the property. - UTF-16BE （字碼頁為 1201年），這藉由呼叫具現化或具有建構函式`bigEndian`值`true`。UTF-16BE (code page 1201), which is instantiated by calling the or constructor with a `bigEndian` value of `true`. - Utf-32 和 UTF-32LE （字碼頁為 12000），傳回屬性。UTF-32 and UTF-32LE (code page 12000), which is returned by the property. - UTF-32BE （字碼頁 12001），這藉由呼叫具現化建構函式`bigEndian`參數，並提供值`true`方法呼叫中。UTF-32BE (code page 12001), which is instantiated by calling an constructor that has a `bigEndian` parameter and providing a value of `true` in the method call. 從.NET Framework 4.6 開始讓無法使用的基底類別的.NET framework 可用編碼。Starting with the .NET Framework 4.6, is the base class that makes otherwise unavailable encodings available to the .NET Framework. 這包含下列步驟：This involves the following steps: 1. 定義的子類別會覆寫兩個抽象多載，和。Define a subclass of that overrides the two abstract overloads, and . 這些多載會傳回在其他不支援的編碼方式字碼頁識別項和名稱。These overloads return the otherwise unsupported encoding by code page identifier and by name. 請注意，您也可以選擇傳回編碼預設方法呼叫的引數為 0。Note that you can also choose to return a default encoding if the method is called with an argument of 0. 2. （選擇性） 您可以覆寫虛擬和方法。Optionally, you can override the virtual and methods. 在大部分情況下，這並非必要，因為基底類別提供的預設實作。In most cases, this is not necessary, since the base class provides a default implementation. 3. 傳遞執行個體方法所提供的編碼方式common language runtime 提供的物件。Pass the instance to the method to make the encodings supplied by the object available to the common language runtime. 4. 呼叫多載來擷取的編碼方式。Call an overload to retrieve the encoding. 方法會呼叫對應來判斷是否可以提供要求之編碼方式。The method will call the corresponding to determine whether it can supply the requested encoding. .NET Framework 類別庫會提供一個靜態屬性， ，傳回物件可產生一組完整的編碼方式在桌面的.NET Framework 類別庫可[!INCLUDE[net_core](~/includes/net-core-md.md)]應用程式。The .NET Framework Class Library provides one static property, , that returns an object that makes the full set of encodings available on the desktop .NET Framework Class Library available to [!INCLUDE[net_core](~/includes/net-core-md.md)] applications. 此外，您可以從衍生類別，以提供您自己的編碼方式。In addition, you can derive from the class to make your own encodings available.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Returns an encoding.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Text.Encoding GetEncoding(int32 codepage) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function GetEncoding (codepage As Integer) As Encoding

param.name: codepage
param.span: 要求之編碼方式的字碼頁識別項。

span.span: The code page identifier of the requested encoding.

summary.span: 傳回與指定字碼頁識別項相關聯的編碼方式。

span.span: Returns the encoding associated with the specified code page identifier.

returns.span: 與指定字碼頁相關聯的編碼方式，或者，如果 無法傳回對應於 的有效編碼方式，則為 。

span.span: The encoding that is associated with the specified code page, or if this cannot return a valid encoding that corresponds to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks ### 繼承者注意事項Notes to inheritors 您覆寫[GetEncoding(Int32)]()方法傳回的編碼方式或所支援的編碼程式子類別。You override the [GetEncoding(Int32)]() method to return the encoding or encodings supported by your subclass. 當使用者程式碼嘗試擷取的編碼方式，藉由呼叫[GetEncoding(Int32)]()方法，此方法會傳遞`codepage`識別碼給每個已註冊編碼的提供者直到其中一個傳回的有效編碼方式。When user code attempts to retrieve an encoding by calling the [GetEncoding(Int32)]() method, the method passes the `codepage` identifier to every registered encoding provider until one returns a valid encoding. 如果沒有傳回有效的編碼， [GetEncoding(Int32)]()方法嘗試擷取快取的編碼方式，其字碼頁識別項是`codepage`。If none returns a valid encoding, the [GetEncoding(Int32)]() method attempts to retrieve a cached encoding whose code page identifier is `codepage`. 因為這個緣故，如果`codepage`不是字碼頁識別項的編碼方式的支援，這個方法應傳回`null`; 它應該絕不會擲回例外狀況。Because of this, if `codepage` is not the code page identifier of an encoding that you support, the method should return `null`; it should never throw an exception. 請注意，您也可以選擇傳回預設字碼頁，如果值`codepage`引數為 0。Note that you can also choose to return a default code page if the value of the `codepage` argument is 0. ## 呼叫者注意事項Notes to callers 這個方法會呼叫[Encoding.GetEncoding(Int32)]()方法。This method is called by the [Encoding.GetEncoding(Int32)]() method. 您不應該呼叫它，直接從使用者程式碼。You should not call it directly from user code.

para.span: 您覆寫方法傳回的編碼方式或所支援的編碼程式子類別。

span.span: You override the method to return the encoding or encodings supported by your subclass.

para.span: 當使用者程式碼嘗試擷取的編碼方式，藉由呼叫方法，此方法會傳遞識別碼給每個已註冊編碼的提供者直到其中一個傳回的有效編碼方式。

span.span: When user code attempts to retrieve an encoding by calling the method, the method passes the identifier to every registered encoding provider until one returns a valid encoding.

para.span: 如果沒有傳回有效的編碼，方法嘗試擷取快取的編碼方式，其字碼頁識別項是。

span.span: If none returns a valid encoding, the method attempts to retrieve a cached encoding whose code page identifier is .

para.span: 因為這個緣故，如果不是字碼頁識別項的編碼方式的支援，這個方法應傳回; 它應該絕不會擲回例外狀況。

span.span: Because of this, if is not the code page identifier of an encoding that you support, the method should return ; it should never throw an exception.

para.span: 這個方法會呼叫方法。

span.span: This method is called by the method.

para.span: 您不應該呼叫它，直接從使用者程式碼。

span.span: You should not call it directly from user code.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Text.Encoding GetEncoding(string name) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function GetEncoding (name As String) As Encoding

param.name: name
param.span: 要求之編碼方式的名稱。

span.span: The name of the requested encoding.

summary.span: 傳回具有指定名稱的編碼方式。

span.span: Returns the encoding with the specified name.

returns.span: 與指定名稱相關聯的編碼方式，或者，如果 無法傳回對應於 的有效編碼方式，則為 。

span.span: The encoding that is associated with the specified name, or if this cannot return a valid encoding that corresponds to .

remarks.format: ## 繼承者注意事項Notes to inheritors 您覆寫[GetEncoding(String)]()方法傳回的編碼方式或所支援的編碼程式子類別。You override the [GetEncoding(String)]() method to return the encoding or encodings supported by your subclass. 當使用者程式碼嘗試擷取的編碼方式，藉由呼叫[GetEncoding(String)]()方法，此方法會傳遞`name`每個已註冊編碼的提供者直到其中一個傳回的有效編碼方式的引數。When user code attempts to retrieve an encoding by calling the [GetEncoding(String)]() method, the method passes the `name` argument to every registered encoding provider until one returns a valid encoding. 如果沒有傳回有效的編碼， [GetEncoding(String)]()方法嘗試擷取快取的編碼方式，其名稱是`name`。If none returns a valid encoding, the [GetEncoding(String)]() method attempts to retrieve a cached encoding whose name is `name`. 因為這個緣故，如果`name`不支援，這個方法應傳回的編碼名稱`null`。Because of this, if `name` is not the name of an encoding that you support, the method should return `null`. 中的方法應該擲回例外狀況的唯一情況是如果`name`是`null`。The only case in which the method should throw an exception is if `name` is `null`. ## 呼叫者注意事項Notes to callers 這個方法會呼叫[Encoding.GetEncoding(String)]()方法。This method is called by the [Encoding.GetEncoding(String)]() method. 您不應該呼叫它，直接從使用者程式碼。You should not call it directly from user code.

span.span: If none returns a valid encoding, the method attempts to retrieve a cached encoding whose name is .

span.span: Because of this, if is not the name of an encoding that you support, the method should return .

para.span: 中的方法應該擲回例外狀況的唯一情況是如果是。

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Text.Encoding GetEncoding (int codepage, System.Text.EncoderFallback encoderFallback, System.Text.DecoderFallback decoderFallback);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Text.Encoding GetEncoding(int32 codepage, class System.Text.EncoderFallback encoderFallback, class System.Text.DecoderFallback decoderFallback) cil managed
public: virtual System::Text::Encoding ^ GetEncoding(int codepage, System::Text::EncoderFallback ^ encoderFallback, System::Text::DecoderFallback ^ decoderFallback);

param.name: codepage
param.span: 要求之編碼方式的字碼頁識別項。

span.span: The code page identifier of the requested encoding.

param.name: encoderFallback
param.span: 物件，在無法以這個編碼方式將字元編碼時提供錯誤處理程序。

span.span: An object that provides an error-handling procedure when a character cannot be encoded with this encoding.

param.name: decoderFallback
param.span: 物件，在無法以這個編碼方式將位元組序列解碼時提供錯誤處理程序。

span.span: An object that provides an error-handling procedure when a byte sequence cannot be decoded with this encoding.

summary.span: 傳回與指定字碼頁識別項相關聯的編碼方式。

span.span: Returns the encoding associated with the specified code page identifier.

summary.span: 參數會針對無法編碼的字元以及無法解碼的位元組序列指定錯誤處理常式。

span.span: Parameters specify an error handler for characters that cannot be encoded and byte sequences that cannot be decoded.

returns.span: 與指定字碼頁相關聯的編碼方式，或者，如果 無法傳回對應於 的有效編碼方式，則為 。

span.span: The encoding that is associated with the specified code page, or if this cannot return a valid encoding that corresponds to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `encoderFallback`和`decoderFallback`參數是物件，定義所使用的編碼器無法將字元轉換成位元組序列，或解碼器無法將位元組序列轉換為字元的後援策略。The `encoderFallback` and `decoderFallback` parameters are objects that define the fallback strategy used in the event that an encoder cannot convert a character to a sequence of bytes or a decoder cannot convert a sequence of bytes to a character. .NET Framework 提供下列後援機制：The .NET Framework provides the following fallback mechanisms: - 例外狀況後援。Exception fallback. 如果`encoderFallback`引數是的執行個體，或`decoderExceptionFallback`引數是的執行個體，如果無法編碼的字元，而且如果位元組解碼方法擲回例外狀況的編碼方法擲回例外狀況無法解碼順序。If the `encoderFallback` argument is an instance of , or the `decoderExceptionFallback` argument is an instance of , the encoding method throws an exception if characters cannot be encoded, and the decoding method throws an exception if a byte sequence cannot be decoded. - 取代後援。Replacement fallback. 如果`encoderFallback`引數是的執行個體，或`decoderExceptionFallback`引數是的執行個體、 編碼和解碼方法取代無法編碼的字元取代字串和位元組序列不可為解碼。If the `encoderFallback` argument is an instance of , or the `decoderExceptionFallback` argument is an instance of , the encoding and decoding methods substitute a replacement string for characters that cannot be encoded and byte sequences cannot be decoded. 如果您透過具現化取代後援物件呼叫預設建構函式，取代字元是"？"。If you instantiated the replacement fallback object by calling the default constructor, the replacement character is a "?". 如果您呼叫或建構函式，您可以指定取代字串。If you call the or constructor, you can specify the replacement string. - 自動調整的後援。Best-fit fallback. 您可以從衍生或類別來實作自動調整的取代機制。You can derive from the or class to implement a best-fit replacement mechanism.

para.span: 因為呼叫此方法會使用您實作方法，您不必覆寫它。

span.span: Because calls to this method use your implementation of the method, you do not have to override it.

para.span: 當使用者程式碼嘗試擷取的編碼方式，藉由呼叫方法，此方法會傳遞識別碼給每個已註冊編碼的提供者直到其中一個傳回的有效編碼方式。

span.span: When user code attempts to retrieve an encoding by calling the method, the method passes the identifier to every registered encoding provider until one returns a valid encoding.

para.span: 如果沒有傳回有效的編碼，方法嘗試擷取快取的編碼方式，其字碼頁識別項是。

span.span: If none returns a valid encoding, the method attempts to retrieve a cached encoding whose code page identifier is .

para.span: 因為這個緣故，如果您選擇要覆寫方法，您的覆寫應傳回如果的編碼方式的字碼頁識別項不是，您的支援，它應該絕不會擲回例外狀況。

span.span: Because of this, if you do choose to override the method, your override should return if is not the code page identifier of an encoding that you support; it should never throw an exception.

para.span: 這個方法會呼叫方法。

span.span: This method is called by the method.

para.span: 您不應該呼叫它，直接從使用者程式碼。

span.span: You should not call it directly from user code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `encoderFallback`和`decoderFallback`參數是物件，定義所使用的編碼器無法將字元轉換成位元組序列，或解碼器無法將位元組序列轉換為字元的後援策略。The `encoderFallback` and `decoderFallback` parameters are objects that define the fallback strategy used in the event that an encoder cannot convert a character to a sequence of bytes or a decoder cannot convert a sequence of bytes to a character. .NET Framework 提供下列後援機制：The .NET Framework provides the following fallback mechanisms: - 例外狀況後援。Exception fallback. 如果`encoderFallback`引數是的執行個體，或`decoderExceptionFallback`引數是的執行個體，如果無法編碼的字元，而且如果位元組解碼方法擲回例外狀況的編碼方法擲回例外狀況無法解碼順序。If the `encoderFallback` argument is an instance of , or the `decoderExceptionFallback` argument is an instance of , the encoding method throws an exception if characters cannot be encoded, and the decoding method throws an exception if a byte sequence cannot be decoded. - 取代後援。Replacement fallback. 如果`encoderFallback`引數是的執行個體，或`decoderExceptionFallback`引數是的執行個體、 編碼和解碼方法取代無法編碼的字元取代字串和位元組序列不可為解碼。If the `encoderFallback` argument is an instance of , or the `decoderExceptionFallback` argument is an instance of , the encoding and decoding methods substitute a replacement string for characters that cannot be encoded and byte sequences cannot be decoded. 如果您透過具現化取代後援物件呼叫預設建構函式，取代字元是"？"。If you instantiated the replacement fallback object by calling the default constructor, the replacement character is a "?". 如果您呼叫或建構函式，您可以指定取代字串。If you call the or constructor, you can specify the replacement string. - 自動調整的後援。Best-fit fallback. 您可以從衍生或類別來實作自動調整的取代機制。You can derive from the or class to implement a best-fit replacement mechanism.

para.span: 因為呼叫此方法會使用您實作方法，您不必覆寫它。

span.span: Because calls to this method use your implementation of the method, you do not have to override it.

para.span: 當使用者程式碼嘗試擷取的編碼方式，藉由呼叫方法，此方法會傳遞識別碼給每個已註冊編碼的提供者直到其中一個傳回的有效編碼方式。

span.span: Because of this, if you do choose to override the method, your override should return if is not the code page identifier of an encoding that you support; it should never throw an exception.
